mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT count(*) FROM follow WHERE standard = #{nickname}) as following, (SELECT count(*) FROM follow WHERE target = #{nickname}) as follower

SELECT dod.*, be.target AS status FROM (SELECT n.nickname, n.rating, n.follower, n.profile, m.content FROM (SELECT q.nickname, q.rating, p.follower, q.profile FROM ( (SELECT DISTINCT nickname, rating, profile FROM member as m JOIN follow as f ON m.nickname = f.target) as q JOIN (SELECT follower, nickname FROM ((SELECT count(target) as follower, target as nickname FROM follow GROUP BY target) as a JOIN (SELECT standard FROM follow WHERE target = #{nickname}) as b ON a.nickname = b.standard) AS c) as p ON q.nickname = p.nickname)) as n JOIN ( SELECT nickname, count(*) as content FROM marketBoard GROUP BY nickname) as m ON n.nickname = m.nickname) as dod LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.target FROM (SELECT * FROM follow where standard = #{nickname}) AS a JOIN (SELECT * FROM follow) AS b ON a.standard = b.target AND a.target = b.standard) as be on dod.nickname = be.target;

SELECT n.nickname, n.rating, n.following, n.profile, m.content FROM (SELECT q.nickname, q.rating, p.follower as following, q.profile FROM ( (SELECT DISTINCT nickname, rating, profile FROM member as m JOIN follow as f ON m.nickname = f.target) as q JOIN (SELECT follower, nickname FROM ((SELECT count(target) as follower, target as nickname FROM follow GROUP BY target) as a JOIN (SELECT target FROM follow WHERE standard = #{nickname}) as b ON a.nickname = b.target) AS c) as p ON q.nickname = p.nickname)) as n JOIN ( SELECT nickname, count(*) as content FROM marketBoard GROUP BY nickname) as m ON n.nickname = m.nickname;
SELECT standard AS nickname, target AS following FROM follow WHERE standard = #{nickname} AND target = #{following}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM follow WHERE standard = #{nickname} AND target = #{following}
